name: Adventurer Elizabeth
description:
Will Elizabeth and her friends make it to pre school?  Will the Wacky Witch stop them?  An an Adventure with  some live voice, photos of real locations and maps of all real locations.  Almost as if it is telling a true story.

Daughter wanted a game that was like Dora the Explorer and so I put her in the game as Adventurer Elizabeth including a song very similar to what I sing when she is fussy.  I'm just a Dad making a fool of himself for his daughter.  Enjoy.  

Not all voicing is in and some intended pieces have not yet been added in.  Also a few graphics of Cati are to be made.
